summary: This cable discusses Pedroga as a possible lead to Eryva. It mentions Pedroga's connection to Lifanil, her possible identity as the wife of Xio Layva Fuentes, and her potential as a recruitment/defection target. It also notes negative traces on Pedroga and requests further action.
title: RE PARA THREE & REF A LAQUEL PEDROSA BE LEIVA
